title: "Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(flexdashboard)
```

```{r}
restaurants =
  rest_inspec |> 
  select(boro, inspection_date, score, grade, zipcode) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  filter(boro != c('Missing')) |> 
  filter(grade != c('Z')) |> 
  filter(grade != c('P')) |>
  filter(grade != c('Not Yet Graded'))
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatterplot of Restaurant Scores in Manhattan

```{r}
restaurants |> 
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~inspection_date, y = ~score, color = ~score,
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers", alpha = 0.5)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Box Plot of Restaurant Inspection Scores in Brooklyn

```{r}
restaurants |> 
  filter(boro == "BROOKLYN") |> 
  plot_ly(y = ~score, type = "box", colors = "viridis")
```

### Bar Chart of Resturant Inspection Grade Count for Queens Restaurants

```{r}
restaurants |> 
  filter(boro == "QUEENS") |> 
  count(grade) |> 
  mutate(grade = fct_reorder(grade, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~grade, y = ~n, color = ~grade,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```
